review: Very Good Doctor. I am unable to walk with the ligament tear issue and other doctors suggested me for plastering. But when I visited to this doctor, He told plastering is not required and he has given only tablets and within one week of time my leg came to the normal and now am walking fine.

Explained very well about the tear that was causing me the pain and what is the procedure involved to correct the same.    Cleared all my doubts.  Very convinced that I am with the right hands to go  through the procedure.  Our appointment was delayed by few minutes and the doctor was so humble to be even saying sorry he got delayed.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Got reference of Dr Bharat for my wife's ligament tier in right hand wrist. was very happy with the treatment which eventually had to be done through surgery at Manipal hospital HAL road which turns out to be a major surgery. post surgery and physiotherapy which lasted for 3 months the results were good and she was able to almost do all things as before. so very happy and thankful to the doctor for helping us with this complicated treatment and surgery.
no respect to the patent.after waiting more than one hour also not sent inside.. booking in online is no use based receiption only pations r allowed

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Actually wife was suffering from Tennis Elbow. After prescribing medicine there is some improvement. Thanks to Doctor
He said that i have to take medicines for 10 days and physiotherapy for 2 weeks continued with physio exercises.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I'm happy with doctor but not with practo app. I had booked my appointment but when i went to hospital it was appearing in their system due to which i was considered as walk-in. Henceforth will call hospital directly for appointment n not thru practo

Doctor did not give much time  , I felt as if I am being admitted for surgery in hurry, simple thing if splint is put for long time (a month/40 days) obviously wrist will get stiffened, Dr was scaring me as if stiffened wrist is a big issue . ** ** *** **** ** ******* ***** ** ******** **** *** ******* ** ********* *** *** *** **** ********** ****** **** ***** ***** *** *** *** **** *********

The doctor seemed patient, kind, and efficient. He explained the issue well to my mother who had a painful shoulder for a few months. But our appointment was for 12:30 pm but we managed to see the doctor only after 2 pm as the clinic was taking in patients on a first come first served basis.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Extremely happy with Dr. Bharath Kadadi, listens to his patients and with his great experience prescribes the right medecines and tests ensuring his patients recover.I definitely recommend Dr. Bharath Kadadi, specialists with emense experience, ********* *** *** **** ********** ******* He will be our family orthopedic doctor always.
